metadata.description: This is a complete backup of all Bihar relationships in preparation for deleting some unused relationships.

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: The age range for the person

configuration.name: qry
configuration.value: CASE WHEN `demographic+birth_date` IS NULL THEN '?' WHEN DATE_ADD( `demographic+birth_date`, INTERVAL 17 YEAR ) > NOW() THEN '-18' WHEN DATE_ADD( `demographic+birth_date`, INTERVAL 23 YEAR ) > NOW() THEN '18-23' WHEN DATE_ADD( `demographic+birth_date`, INTERVAL 29 YEAR ) > NOW() THEN '24-29' WHEN DATE_ADD( `demographic+birth_date`, INTERVAL 34 YEAR ) > NOW() THEN '30-34' WHEN DATE_ADD( `demographic+birth_date`, INTERVAL 39 YEAR ) > NOW() THEN '35-39' WHEN DATE_ADD( `demographic+birth_date`, INTERVAL 44 YEAR ) > NOW() THEN '40-44' WHEN DATE_ADD( `demographic+birth_date`, INTERVAL 49 YEAR ) > NOW() THEN '45-49' WHEN DATE_ADD( `demographic+birth_date`, INTERVAL 54 YEAR ) > NOW() THEN '50-54' WHEN DATE_ADD( `demographic+birth_date`, INTERVAL 59 YEAR ) > NOW() THEN '55-59' WHEN DATE_ADD( `demographic+birth_date`, INTERVAL 64 YEAR ) > NOW() THEN '60-64' ELSE '65+' END

configuration.name: qry
configuration.value: CASE WHEN `demographic+birth_date` IS NULL THEN '?' WHEN DATE_ADD( `demographic+birth_date`, INTERVAL 17 YEAR ) > NOW() THEN '-18' WHEN DATE_ADD( `demographic+birth_date`, INTERVAL 23 YEAR ) > NOW() THEN '18-23' WHEN DATE_ADD( `demographic+birth_date`, INTERVAL 29 YEAR ) > NOW() THEN '24-29' WHEN DATE_ADD( `demographic+birth_date`, INTERVAL 34 YEAR ) > NOW() THEN '30-34' WHEN DATE_ADD( `demographic+birth_date`, INTERVAL 39 YEAR ) > NOW() THEN '35-39' WHEN DATE_ADD( `demographic+birth_date`, INTERVAL 44 YEAR ) > NOW() THEN '40-44' WHEN DATE_ADD( `demographic+birth_date`, INTERVAL 49 YEAR ) > NOW() THEN '45-49' WHEN DATE_ADD( `demographic+birth_date`, INTERVAL 54 YEAR ) > NOW() THEN '50-54' WHEN DATE_ADD( `demographic+birth_date`, INTERVAL 59 YEAR ) > NOW() THEN '55-59' WHEN DATE_ADD( `demographic+birth_date`, INTERVAL 64 YEAR ) > NOW() THEN '60-64' ELSE '65+' END

WHEN DATE_ADD( `demographic+birth_date`, INTERVAL 17 YEAR ) > NOW() THEN '-18' WHEN DATE_ADD( `demographic+birth_date`, INTERVAL 23 YEAR ) > NOW() THEN '18-23' WHEN DATE_ADD( `demographic+birth_date`, INTERVAL 29 YEAR ) > NOW() THEN '24-29' WHEN DATE_ADD( `demographic+birth_date`, INTERVAL 34 YEAR ) > NOW() THEN '30-34' WHEN DATE_ADD( `demographic+birth_date`, INTERVAL 39 YEAR ) > NOW() THEN '35-39' WHEN DATE_ADD( `demographic+birth_date`, INTERVAL 44 YEAR ) > NOW() THEN '40-44' WHEN DATE_ADD( `demographic+birth_date`, INTERVAL 49 YEAR ) > NOW() THEN '45-49' WHEN DATE_ADD( `demographic+birth_date`, INTERVAL 54 YEAR ) > NOW() THEN '50-54' WHEN DATE_ADD( `demographic+birth_date`, INTERVAL 59 YEAR ) > NOW() THEN '55-59' WHEN DATE_ADD( `demographic+birth_date`, INTERVAL 64 YEAR ) > NOW() THEN '60-64' ELSE '65+' END

configuration.name: qry
configuration.value: DATE_FORMAT( IF( DATE_FORMAT( `primary_form+start_date`, CONCAT(YEAR(CURDATE()), '-%m-%d 00:00:00') ) > CURDATE(), DATE_FORMAT( `primary_form+start_date`, CONCAT(YEAR(CURDATE()), '-%m-%d 00:00:00') ), DATE_ADD( DATE_FORMAT( `primary_form+start_date`, CONCAT(YEAR(CURDATE()), '-%m-%d 00:00:00') ), INTERVAL 1 YEAR ) ), '%d/%m/%Y')

configuration.name: qry
configuration.value: IF( DATE_FORMAT( `primary_form+start_date`, CONCAT(YEAR(CURDATE()), '-%m-%d 00:00:00') ) > CURDATE(), DATE_FORMAT( `primary_form+start_date`, CONCAT(YEAR(CURDATE()), '-%m-%d 00:00:00') ), DATE_ADD( DATE_FORMAT( `primary_form+start_date`, CONCAT(YEAR(CURDATE()), '-%m-%d 00:00:00') ), INTERVAL 1 YEAR ) )

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: The month and year the contract ends.

configuration.name: qry
configuration.value: DATE_FORMAT( IF( DATE_FORMAT( `primary_form+start_date`, CONCAT(YEAR(CURDATE()), '-%m-%d 00:00:00') ) > CURDATE(), DATE_FORMAT( `primary_form+start_date`, CONCAT(YEAR(CURDATE()), '-%m-%d 00:00:00') ), DATE_ADD( DATE_FORMAT( `primary_form+start_date`, CONCAT(YEAR(CURDATE()), '-%m-%d 00:00:00') ), INTERVAL 1 YEAR ) ) , '%Y %M' )

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: The year the person started in this position.

configuration.value: The designation of the position being deputed.

configuration.name: qry
configuration.value: (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM hippo_person_position pp JOIN hippo_position p ON pp.position = p.id AND p.pos_type = 'position_type|2' JOIN hippo_facility f ON p.facility = f.id LEFT JOIN hippo_county c ON c.id = f.location WHERE p.job IN ( 'job|148', 'job|31', 'job|130', 'job|105', 'job|106', 'job|104', 'job|294', 'job|145', 'job|253', 'job|153', 'job|160', 'job|204', 'job|136', 'job|258', 'job|118', 'job|119', 'job|117', 'job|165', 'job|205', 'job|5', 'job|293', 'job|229', 'job|221', 'job|144', 'job|212', 'job|124', 'job|216', 'job|138', 'job|125', 'job|34', 'job|203', 'job|36', 'job|261', 'job|122', 'job|37', 'job|296', 'job|179', 'job|163', 'job|164', 'job|175', 'job|206', 'job|207', 'job|281', 'job|107', 'job|116', 'job|109', 'job|108', 'job|115', 'job|120', 'job|110', 'job|112', 'job|111', 'job|146', 'job|185', 'job|143', 'job|180', 'job|142', 'job|4', 'job|292', 'job|241', 'job|103', 'job|99', 'job|127', 'job|133', 'job|134', 'job|102', 'job|210', 'job|298', 'job|135', 'job|254', 'job|128', 'job|131', 'job|147', 'job|123', 'job|73', 'job|263', 'job|262', 'job|208', 'job|264', 'job|75', 'job|76', 'job|230', 'job|77', 'job|78', 'job|225', 'job|16', 'job|215', 'job|219', 'job|260', 'job|126', 'job|255', 'job|121', 'job|256', 'job|140', 'job|299', 'job|44', 'job|45', 'job|214', 'job|141', 'job|137', 'job|273', 'job|139', 'job|84', 'job|114', 'job|161', 'job|157', 'job|159', 'job|156', 'job|166', 'job|245', 'job|129', 'job|194', 'job|100', 'job|101', 'job|113', 'job|211', 'job|257', 'job|209', 'job|213', 'job|217', 'job|295') AND (pp.end_date IS NULL OR pp.end_date = '0000-00-00 00:00:00') AND ( f.location = `primary_form+id` OR c.district = `primary_form+id` ))

configuration.name: qry
configuration.value: (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM hippo_person_position pp JOIN hippo_position p ON pp.position = p.id AND p.pos_type = 'position_type|1' JOIN hippo_facility f ON p.facility = f.id LEFT JOIN hippo_county c ON c.id = f.location WHERE p.job IN ( 'job|148', 'job|31', 'job|130', 'job|105', 'job|106', 'job|104', 'job|294', 'job|145', 'job|253', 'job|153', 'job|160', 'job|204', 'job|136', 'job|258', 'job|118', 'job|119', 'job|117', 'job|165', 'job|205', 'job|5', 'job|293', 'job|229', 'job|221', 'job|144', 'job|212', 'job|124', 'job|216', 'job|138', 'job|125', 'job|34', 'job|203', 'job|36', 'job|261', 'job|122', 'job|37', 'job|296', 'job|179', 'job|163', 'job|164', 'job|175', 'job|206', 'job|207', 'job|281', 'job|107', 'job|116', 'job|109', 'job|108', 'job|115', 'job|120', 'job|110', 'job|112', 'job|111', 'job|146', 'job|185', 'job|143', 'job|180', 'job|142', 'job|4', 'job|292', 'job|241', 'job|103', 'job|99', 'job|127', 'job|133', 'job|134', 'job|102', 'job|210', 'job|298', 'job|135', 'job|254', 'job|128', 'job|131', 'job|147', 'job|123', 'job|73', 'job|263', 'job|262', 'job|208', 'job|264', 'job|75', 'job|76', 'job|230', 'job|77', 'job|78', 'job|225', 'job|16', 'job|215', 'job|219', 'job|260', 'job|126', 'job|255', 'job|121', 'job|256', 'job|140', 'job|299', 'job|44', 'job|45', 'job|214', 'job|141', 'job|137', 'job|273', 'job|139', 'job|84', 'job|114', 'job|161', 'job|157', 'job|159', 'job|156', 'job|166', 'job|245', 'job|129', 'job|194', 'job|100', 'job|101', 'job|113', 'job|211', 'job|257', 'job|209', 'job|213', 'job|217', 'job|295') AND (pp.end_date IS NULL OR pp.end_date = '0000-00-00 00:00:00') AND ( f.location = `primary_form+id` OR c.district = `primary_form+id` ))

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: The total contractual and regular employees.

configuration.name: qry
configuration.value: (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM hippo_person_position pp JOIN hippo_position p ON pp.position = p.id AND p.pos_type IN ( 'position_type|2','position_type|1') JOIN hippo_facility f ON p.facility = f.id LEFT JOIN hippo_county c ON c.id = f.location WHERE p.job IN ( 'job|148', 'job|31', 'job|130', 'job|105', 'job|106', 'job|104', 'job|294', 'job|145', 'job|253', 'job|153', 'job|160', 'job|204', 'job|136', 'job|258', 'job|118', 'job|119', 'job|117', 'job|165', 'job|205', 'job|5', 'job|293', 'job|229', 'job|221', 'job|144', 'job|212', 'job|124', 'job|216', 'job|138', 'job|125', 'job|34', 'job|203', 'job|36', 'job|261', 'job|122', 'job|37', 'job|296', 'job|179', 'job|163', 'job|164', 'job|175', 'job|206', 'job|207', 'job|281', 'job|107', 'job|116', 'job|109', 'job|108', 'job|115', 'job|120', 'job|110', 'job|112', 'job|111', 'job|146', 'job|185', 'job|143', 'job|180', 'job|142', 'job|4', 'job|292', 'job|241', 'job|103', 'job|99', 'job|127', 'job|133', 'job|134', 'job|102', 'job|210', 'job|298', 'job|135', 'job|254', 'job|128', 'job|131', 'job|147', 'job|123', 'job|73', 'job|263', 'job|262', 'job|208', 'job|264', 'job|75', 'job|76', 'job|230', 'job|77', 'job|78', 'job|225', 'job|16', 'job|215', 'job|219', 'job|260', 'job|126', 'job|255', 'job|121', 'job|256', 'job|140', 'job|299', 'job|44', 'job|45', 'job|214', 'job|141', 'job|137', 'job|273', 'job|139', 'job|84', 'job|114', 'job|161', 'job|157', 'job|159', 'job|156', 'job|166', 'job|245', 'job|129', 'job|194', 'job|100', 'job|101', 'job|113', 'job|211', 'job|257', 'job|209', 'job|213', 'job|217', 'job|295' ) AND (pp.end_date IS NULL OR pp.end_date = '0000-00-00 00:00:00') AND ( f.location = `primary_form+id` OR c.district = `primary_form+id` ) )

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: The number of APHCs with at least 3 nurses.

configuration.name: qry
configuration.value: ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT `district+id`,`primary_form+name`,COUNT(*) AS nurse FROM `zebra_facility_staff` WHERE `+is_nurse` = 1 AND `facility_type+name` = 'APHC' GROUP BY `district+id`,`primary_form+name`) AS nurse_count WHERE nurse > 2 AND `district+id` = `primary_form+id`)

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: Number of general doctors other than at PHC.

configuration.name: qry
configuration.value: (SELECT gen_doc FROM ( SELECT `district+id`,COUNT(*) AS gen_doc FROM `zebra_facility_staff` WHERE `facility_type+name` <> 'PHC' AND `specialty+specialty` IS NULL AND `+is_doctor` = 1 GROUP BY `district+id`) AS docs WHERE `district+id` = `primary_form+id` )

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: Number of general doctors at PHCs.

configuration.name: qry
configuration.value: ( SELECT gen_doc FROM ( SELECT `district+id`,COUNT(*) as gen_doc FROM `zebra_facility_staff` WHERE `facility_type+name` = 'PHC' AND `specialty+specialty` IS NULL AND `+is_doctor` = 1 GROUP BY `district+id`) as docs WHERE `district+id` = `primary_form+id` )

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: The number of APHCs in this district.

configuration.name: qry
configuration.value: (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT `district+id`,`primary_form+name`,COUNT(*) as positions FROM `zebra_facility_staff` WHERE `facility_type+name` = 'APHC' GROUP BY `district+id`,`primary_form+name`) AS hsc WHERE `district+id` = `primary_form+id`)

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: The number of HSCs for this district.

configuration.name: qry
configuration.value: (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT `district+id`,`primary_form+name`,COUNT(*) as positions FROM `zebra_facility_staff` WHERE `facility_type+name` = 'HSC' GROUP BY `district+id`,`primary_form+name`) AS hsc WHERE `district+id` = `primary_form+id`)

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: The number of PHCs in this district.

configuration.name: qry
configuration.value: (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT `district+id`,`primary_form+name`,COUNT(*) as positions FROM `zebra_facility_staff` WHERE `facility_type+name` = 'PHC' GROUP BY `district+id`,`primary_form+name`) AS hsc WHERE `district+id` = `primary_form+id`)

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: The number of sub divisional hospitals in this district.

configuration.name: qry
configuration.value: (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT `district+id`,`primary_form+name`,COUNT(*) as positions FROM `zebra_facility_staff` WHERE `facility_type+name` = 'Sub-Divisional Hospital' GROUP BY `district+id`,`primary_form+name`) AS hsc WHERE `district+id` = `primary_form+id`)

configuration.name: qry
configuration.value: (SELECT nurse FROM ( SELECT `district+id`,COUNT(*) AS nurse FROM `zebra_facility_staff` WHERE `facility_type+name` = 'RH' AND `+is_nurse` = 1 GROUP BY `district+id`) AS nurses WHERE `district+id` = `primary_form+id` )

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: Number of nurses at other than CHC.

configuration.name: qry
configuration.value: (SELECT nurse FROM ( SELECT `district+id`,COUNT(*) AS nurse FROM `zebra_facility_staff` WHERE `facility_type+name` <> 'CHC' AND `+is_nurse` = 1 GROUP BY `district+id`) AS nurses WHERE `district+id` = `primary_form+id` )

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: Number of paramedics in this district.

configuration.name: qry
configuration.value: (SELECT paramedics FROM (SELECT `district+id`,COUNT(`+is_paramedical`) AS paramedics FROM `zebra_facility_staff` GROUP BY `district+id`) AS paramedic WHERE `district+id` = `primary_form+id`)

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: The number of PHCs with at least 3 nurses.

configuration.name: qry
configuration.value: ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT `district+id`,`primary_form+name`,COUNT(*) AS nurse FROM `zebra_facility_staff` WHERE `+is_nurse` = 1 AND `facility_type+name` = 'PHC' GROUP BY `district+id`,`primary_form+name`) AS nurse_count WHERE nurse > 2 AND `district+id` = `primary_form+id`)

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: The number of Sub Divisional Hospitals with at least 3 nurses.

configuration.name: qry
configuration.value: ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT `district+id`,`primary_form+name`,COUNT(*) AS nurse FROM `zebra_facility_staff` WHERE `+is_nurse` = 1 AND `facility_type+name` = 'Sub-Divisional Hospital' GROUP BY `district+id`,`primary_form+name`) AS nurse_count WHERE nurse > 2 AND `district+id` = `primary_form+id`)

configuration.name: qry
configuration.value: (SELECT doc FROM ( SELECT `district+id`,COUNT(*) AS doc FROM `zebra_facility_staff` WHERE `facility_type+name` = 'CHC' AND `specialty+specialty` IS NOT NULL AND `+is_doctor` = 1 GROUP BY `district+id`) AS docs WHERE `district+id` = `primary_form+id` )

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: Total specialists at other than CHC.

configuration.name: qry
configuration.value: (SELECT doc FROM ( SELECT `district+id`,COUNT(*) AS doc FROM `zebra_facility_staff` WHERE `facility_type+name` <> 'CHC' AND `specialty+specialty` IS NOT NULL AND `+is_doctor` = 1 GROUP BY `district+id`) AS docs WHERE `district+id` = `primary_form+id` )

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: The number of sub centers in this district that have more than one ANM.

configuration.name: qry
configuration.value: ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT `district+id`,`primary_form+name`,COUNT(*) AS anms FROM `zebra_facility_staff` WHERE `job+title` = 'ANM' AND `facility_type+name` = 'HSC' GROUP BY `district+id`,`primary_form+name`) AS anm_count WHERE anms > 1 AND `district+id` = `primary_form+id`)

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: The total of sub centers with only 1 ANM for this district.

configuration.name: qry
configuration.value: ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT `district+id`,`primary_form+name`,COUNT(*) AS anms FROM `zebra_facility_staff` WHERE `job+title` = 'ANM' AND `facility_type+name` = 'HSC' GROUP BY `district+id`,`primary_form+name`) AS anm_count WHERE anms = 1 AND `district+id` = `primary_form+id`)

WHEN DATE_ADD( `demographic+birth_date`, INTERVAL 17 YEAR ) > NOW() THEN '-18' WHEN DATE_ADD( `demographic+birth_date`, INTERVAL 23 YEAR ) > NOW() THEN '18-23' WHEN DATE_ADD( `demographic+birth_date`, INTERVAL 29 YEAR ) > NOW() THEN '24-29' WHEN DATE_ADD( `demographic+birth_date`, INTERVAL 34 YEAR ) > NOW() THEN '30-34' WHEN DATE_ADD( `demographic+birth_date`, INTERVAL 39 YEAR ) > NOW() THEN '35-39' WHEN DATE_ADD( `demographic+birth_date`, INTERVAL 44 YEAR ) > NOW() THEN '40-44' WHEN DATE_ADD( `demographic+birth_date`, INTERVAL 49 YEAR ) > NOW() THEN '45-49' WHEN DATE_ADD( `demographic+birth_date`, INTERVAL 54 YEAR ) > NOW() THEN '50-54' WHEN DATE_ADD( `demographic+birth_date`, INTERVAL 59 YEAR ) > NOW() THEN '55-59' WHEN DATE_ADD( `demographic+birth_date`, INTERVAL 64 YEAR ) > NOW() THEN '60-64' ELSE '65+' END

configuration.name: description

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: The contact information for this facility.

configuration.value: The facility type for this facility.

configuration.value: The state where this facility is located.

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: The division where this facility is for limits.

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: The number of filled positions in this facility.

configuration.name: qry
configuration.value: (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM `hippo_position` WHERE facility = `primary_form+id` and status = 'position_status|closed')

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: The number of open positions at this facility.

configuration.name: qry
configuration.value: (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM `hippo_position` WHERE facility = `primary_form+id` and status = 'position_status|open')

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: Facility selector relationship for REFERENCE/MAP fields.

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: The block where this facility is located.

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: The district where this facility is located.

configuration.value: The division where this facility is located.

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: The facility type for this facility.

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: The state where this facility is located.

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: The district as a MAP for filters.

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: The division field as a MAP for filters.

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: A list of all facilities with certain specialties.

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: The block where this facility is located.

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: The district where this facility is located.

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: The division where this facility is located.

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: The state where this facility is located.

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: Number of people that have the specialty Anesthesiology in this facility.

configuration.name: qry
configuration.value: (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM hippo_position pos JOIN hippo_person_position pp ON pp.position = pos.id AND (pp.end_date IS NULL or pp.end_date = '0000-00-00 00:00:00') JOIN hippo_education e ON e.parent = pp.parent AND e.specialty = 'specialty|51' where pos.facility = `primary_form+id`)

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: The district where this facility is located for limits.

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: Number of people with the specialty Obstetrics and Gynecology in the facility.

configuration.name: qry
configuration.value: (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM hippo_position pos JOIN hippo_person_position pp ON pp.position = pos.id AND (pp.end_date IS NULL or pp.end_date = '0000-00-00 00:00:00') JOIN hippo_education e ON e.parent = pp.parent AND e.specialty = 'specialty|67' where pos.facility = `primary_form+id`)

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: Number of people working in this facility with the specialty Pediatrics.

configuration.name: qry
configuration.value: (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM hippo_position pos JOIN hippo_person_position pp ON pp.position = pos.id AND (pp.end_date IS NULL or pp.end_date = '0000-00-00 00:00:00') JOIN hippo_education e ON e.parent = pp.parent AND e.specialty = 'specialty|73' where pos.facility = `primary_form+id`)

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: The district where this facility is.

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: The facility type of this facility.

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: The details for the person currently filling this position.

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: One specialty for this person if they have one.

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: Set to 1 if the person is a doctor.

configuration.name: qry
configuration.value: IF( `job+title` IN ( 'Additional Chief Medical Officer', 'Civil Assistant Surgeon', 'Civil Surgeon-cum-Chief Medical Officer', 'Medical Officer', 'Medical Officer -in -Charge', 'District Blindness Control Officer', 'District IDD/Filaria Officer', 'District Immunization Officer', 'District Malaria Officer' ), 1, NULL )

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: Set to 1 if the person is a nurse.

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: Set to 1 if the person is paramedical.

configuration.name: qry
configuration.value: IF( `job+title` IN ( 'ECG Technician', 'Female Paramedical Worker', 'Lab Technician', 'Male Paramedical Worker', 'Medical Record Technician', 'Operation Theatre Assistant', 'Ophthalmic Assistant', 'X Ray Technician' ), 1, NULL )

configuration.value: All information related to a position.

configuration.value: The classification associated with this job.

configuration.value: The cadre associated with this job.

configuration.value: The last person that filled this position.

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: The number of days this positions was open before being filled.

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: A relationship to be accessed by other report functions to get the highest professional qualification for a record. This relationship will include all professional qualification education records.

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: Regular Staff relationship for non-contract staff.

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: The current salary for this person.

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: The person currently filling this position.

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: Emergency Contact details for this person.

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: Home contact details for this person.

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: The designation this person first held with the government.

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: Work contact details for this person.

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: The position held by this person.

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: The facility where this position works.

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: The district where this facility is located.

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: The job associated with this position.

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: The job classification for this position.

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: The starting salary for this person in their current position.

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: The age range for the person

configuration.name: qry
configuration.value: CASE WHEN `demographic+birth_date` IS NULL THEN '?' WHEN DATE_ADD( `demographic+birth_date`, INTERVAL 17 YEAR ) > NOW() THEN '-18' WHEN DATE_ADD( `demographic+birth_date`, INTERVAL 23 YEAR ) > NOW() THEN '18-23' WHEN DATE_ADD( `demographic+birth_date`, INTERVAL 29 YEAR ) > NOW() THEN '24-29' WHEN DATE_ADD( `demographic+birth_date`, INTERVAL 34 YEAR ) > NOW() THEN '30-34' WHEN DATE_ADD( `demographic+birth_date`, INTERVAL 39 YEAR ) > NOW() THEN '35-39' WHEN DATE_ADD( `demographic+birth_date`, INTERVAL 44 YEAR ) > NOW() THEN '40-44' WHEN DATE_ADD( `demographic+birth_date`, INTERVAL 49 YEAR ) > NOW() THEN '45-49' WHEN DATE_ADD( `demographic+birth_date`, INTERVAL 54 YEAR ) > NOW() THEN '50-54' WHEN DATE_ADD( `demographic+birth_date`, INTERVAL 59 YEAR ) > NOW() THEN '55-59' WHEN DATE_ADD( `demographic+birth_date`, INTERVAL 64 YEAR ) > NOW() THEN '60-64' ELSE '65+' END

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: The district where this facility is located for limits.

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: The year the person started in this position.

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: The join date of this person based on the joining_job if present or the start_date otherwise.

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: The duration of service for this person.

configuration.name: qry
configuration.value: IF( MONTH(NOW()) - MONTH(`+join_date`) < 0, CONCAT( YEAR(NOW()) - YEAR(`+join_date`) - 1, ' year(s) ', 12 + MONTH(NOW()) - MONTH(`+join_date`), ' month(s)'), CONCAT(YEAR(NOW()) - YEAR(`+join_date`), ' year(s) ', MONTH(NOW()) - MONTH(`+join_date`), ' month(s)'))

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: The formatted date the person is retiring.

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: Filled and Sanctioned Positions by District (2010)

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: Search relationship for all person records.

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: The last position this person has held.

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: The position details for the last position held by this person.

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: The last job held by this person.

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: The last facility where this person worked.

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: The current status of this employee

configuration.name: qry
configuration.value: CASE WHEN `last_person_position+end_date` IS NOT NULL AND `last_person_position+end_date` != '0000-00-00 00:00:00' THEN 'employee_status|old_employee' WHEN `last_person_position+start_date` IS NOT NULL THEN 'employee_status|employee' END

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: Specialty information based on the education relationship.

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: The facility where this person works.

configuration.name: qry
configuration.value: (SELECT `degree+name` FROM zebra_prof_qual WHERE `primary_form+parent` = `person+id` ORDER BY `primary_form+year` DESC LIMIT 1)
